text: Caroly Wilcox (born Carolyn Wilcox; May 16, 1931 â€“ January 9, 2021) was an American puppeteer and theatrical designer. She was best known for her work with the Muppets. She was in Sesame Street, The Muppet Show, and Fraggle Rock, and in The Muppet Movie and The Muppets Take Manhattan. Wilcox died on January 9, 2021, aged 89 years. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American puppeteers Category:People from Pennsylvania
title: Caroly Wilcox
